name: Catch My Tail!
description:
Game Designers: Juhee Kong and Zac Bogner

Team Members: Hope, Christian, Amber, Laura, Niki, Rhen, Kim, Yuval, Melissa, Yongxi, Kara, Lucia, Mikyung, Alice, Emma, Kat, Fernando, Daniel. 

Our Mission: 

We develop and create multiplayer game experiences for your families and friends to enjoy from anywhere in the world. 

The Game: 

Our Game is called Catch My Tail, and is inspired by the traditional Asia folk game, and made it into a 3d online multiplayer game with a minimum of 2 players up to 12 players maximum. Players need to run away from their killers or look for their intended targets and kill them. The last survivor will win the game. 

https://sparqlabs.games/games-item/catch-my-tail/
